channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What's Driving the Strong Market Reaction to Trump Win
item.description: Investors believe they have a handle on what Donald Trump will do this time. But it’s not obvious that they are any better at assessing politics, or t...

item.title: Super Micro shares plunge 17% after company says no timetable for annual results, issues weak guidance
item.description: Super Micro, the embattled server maker, reported preliminary first-quarter results on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump Win Would Have Positive Implications for Oil Sector
item.description: A Donald Trump presidency would likely have positive implications for the entire oil sector in the short term, and in particular stocks exposed to U.S...

item.title: Metal Prices Slump as Trump Win Stokes Demand Fears
item.description: Metal prices slumped with the commodities sector experiencing widespread losses as Donald Trump wins the election.

item.title: British fintech firm Wise posts 55% jump in profit on expanding market share
item.description: British digital payments firm Wise said that its first-half profit totalled £217.3 million ($279.8 million) in the first-half period, up 55% year-over...

item.title: Trump's Comeback Reverberates Through Markets
item.description: Stock futures rose sharply along with the dollar, bond yields and bitcoin, after investors piled into “Trump trades.”

item.title: CVS posts mixed results, holds off on guidance in Joyner's first earnings report as CEO
item.description: CVS expects elevated medical costs to continue to pressure its performance this year, "and as a result we are not providing a formal outlook at this t...

item.title: Futures Surge, Bonds Tumble as Trump Is Elected President
item.description: Futures linked to all three major stock indexes climbed after Donald Trump cruised to victory in the presidential election,.

item.title: Toyota posts nearly 20% drop in second-quarter operating profit, missing estimates
item.description: Despite the lower takings, Toyota had raised its interim and full year dividend forecast

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares jump 8% after Wegovy sales beat expectations
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported third quarter earnings broadly in line with expectations and narrowed its 2024 full-year growth guidance.
